QuestData.Title: Demanding Answers
QuestData.Description: So just how did all those Dark Iron warriors end up here, on the doorstep of Ironforge, on the verge of invading our city?$B$BDoes not 'Empress' Moira, a member of our esteemed Council of Three Hammers, rule the Dark Iron? This cannot have happened without her knowledge and consent. This was no ragtag band of rebel dwarves, but a well-organized and fully equipped invasion force.$B$BI have prepared a report on the battle for the airfield. Take it to Ironforge, to the High Seat and confront her!
QuestData.LogDescription: Take Stonebreaker's Report to Moira Thaurissan in Ironforge's High Seat.
QuestData.CompletionText: What is the meaning of this intrusion?
QuestData.RewardText: And just what is this?$B$B<Moira takes the report and the color drains from her face as she reads.>$B$BThis is impossible!
